00314 #define USART_INITASYNC_DEFAULT                                                            \
00315 {                                                                                          \
00316   usartEnable,      /* Enable RX/TX when init completed. */                                \
00317   0,                /* Use current configured reference clock for configuring baudrate. */ \
00318   115200,           /* 115200 bits/s. */                                                   \
00319   usartOVS16,       /* 16x oversampling. */                                                \
00320   usartDatabits8,   /* 8 databits. */                                                      \
00321   usartNoParity,    /* No parity. */                                                       \
00322   usartStopbits1,   /* 1 stopbit. */                                                       \
00323   false,            /* Do not disable majority vote. */                                    \
00324   false,            /* Not USART PRS input mode. */                                        \
00325   usartPrsRxCh0,    /* PRS channel 0. */                                                   \
00326   false,            /* Auto CS functionality enable/disable switch */                      \
00327   0,                /* Auto CS Hold cycles */                                              \
00328   0                 /* Auto CS Setup cycles */                                             \
00329 }

00424 #if defined(_USART_TIMING_CSHOLD_MASK)
00425 #define USART_INITSYNC_DEFAULT                                                              \
00426 {                                                                                           \
00427   usartEnable,       /* Enable RX/TX when init completed. */                                \
00428   0,                 /* Use current configured reference clock for configuring baudrate. */ \
00429   1000000,           /* 1 Mbits/s. */                                                       \
00430   usartDatabits8,    /* 8 databits. */                                                      \
00431   true,              /* Master mode. */                                                     \
00432   false,             /* Send least significant bit first. */                                \
00433   usartClockMode0,   /* Clock idle low, sample on rising edge. */                           \
00434   false,             /* Not USART PRS input mode. */                                        \
00435   usartPrsRxCh0,     /* PRS channel 0. */                                                   \
00436   false,             /* No AUTOTX mode. */                                                  \
00437   false,             /* No AUTOCS mode */                                                   \
00438   0,                 /* Auto CS Hold cycles */                                              \
00439   0                  /* Auto CS Setup cycles */                                             \
00440 }
00441 #elif defined(USART_INPUT_RXPRS) && defined(USART_TRIGCTRL_AUTOTXTEN)
00442 #define USART_INITSYNC_DEFAULT                                                              \
00443 {                                                                                           \
00444   usartEnable,       /* Enable RX/TX when init completed. */                                \
00445   0,                 /* Use current configured reference clock for configuring baudrate. */ \
00446   1000000,           /* 1 Mbits/s. */                                                       \
00447   usartDatabits8,    /* 8 databits. */                                                      \
00448   true,              /* Master mode. */                                                     \
00449   false,             /* Send least significant bit first. */                                \
00450   usartClockMode0,   /* Clock idle low, sample on rising edge. */                           \
00451   false,             /* Not USART PRS input mode. */                                        \
00452   usartPrsRxCh0,     /* PRS channel 0. */                                                   \
00453   false              /* No AUTOTX mode. */                                                  \
00454 }
00455 #else
00456 #define USART_INITSYNC_DEFAULT                                                              \
00457 {                                                                                           \
00458   usartEnable,       /* Enable RX/TX when init completed. */                                \
00459   0,                 /* Use current configured reference clock for configuring baudrate. */ \
00460   1000000,           /* 1 Mbits/s. */                                                       \
00461   usartDatabits8,    /* 8 databits. */                                                      \
00462   true,              /* Master mode. */                                                     \
00463   false,             /* Send least significant bit first. */                                \
00464   usartClockMode0    /* Clock idle low, sample on rising edge. */                           \
00465 }

00496 #define USART_INITIRDA_DEFAULT                                                              \
00497 {                                                                                           \
00498   {                                                                                         \
00499     usartEnable,     /* Enable RX/TX when init completed. */                                \
00500     0,               /* Use current configured reference clock for configuring baudrate. */ \
00501     115200,          /* 115200 bits/s. */                                                   \
00502     usartOVS16,      /* 16x oversampling. */                                                \
00503     usartDatabits8,  /* 8 databits. */                                                      \
00504     usartEvenParity, /* Even parity. */                                                     \
00505     usartStopbits1   /* 1 stopbit. */                                                       \
00506   },                                                                                        \
00507   false,             /* Rx invert disabled. */                                              \
00508   false,             /* Filtering disabled. */                                              \
00509   usartIrDAPwTHREE,  /* Pulse width is set to ONE. */                                       \
00510   false,             /* Routing to PRS is disabled. */                                      \
00511   usartIrDAPrsCh0    /* PRS channel 0. */                                                   \
00512 }

00517 typedef struct
00518 {
00520   USART_InitSync_TypeDef   sync;
00521 
00523   USART_I2sFormat_TypeDef  format;
00524 
00528   bool                     delay;
00529

00539 
00540 
00542 #define USART_INITI2S_DEFAULT                                                                  \
00543 {                                                                                              \
00544   {                                                                                            \
00545     usartEnableTx,      /* Enable TX when init completed. */                                   \
00546     0,                  /* Use current configured reference clock for configuring baudrate. */ \
00547     1000000,            /* Baudrate 1M bits/s. */                                              \
00548     usartDatabits16,    /* 16 databits. */                                                     \
00549     true,               /* Operate as I2S master. */                                           \
00550     true,               /* Most significant bit first. */                                      \
00551     usartClockMode0,    /* Clock idle low, sample on rising edge. */                           \
00552     false,              /* Don't enable USARTRx via PRS. */                                    \
00553     usartPrsRxCh0,      /* PRS channel selection (dummy). */                                   \
00554     false               /* Disable AUTOTX mode. */                                             \
00555   },                                                                                           \
00556   usartI2sFormatW16D16, /* 16-bit word, 16-bit data */                                         \
00557   true,                 /* Delay on I2S data. */                                               \
00558   false,                /* No DMA split. */                                                    \
00559   usartI2sJustifyLeft,  /* Data is left-justified within the frame */                          \
00560   false                 /* Stereo mode. */                                                     \
00561 }
00562 #endif

00594 /***************************************************************************/
00605 __STATIC_INLINE void USART_IntClear(USART_TypeDef *usart, uint32_t flags)
00606 {
00607   usart->IFC = flags;
00608 }
00609 
00610 
00611 /***************************************************************************/
00622 __STATIC_INLINE void USART_IntDisable(USART_TypeDef *usart, uint32_t flags)
00623 {
00624   usart->IEN &= ~flags;
00625 }
00626 
00627 
00628 /***************************************************************************/
00644 __STATIC_INLINE void USART_IntEnable(USART_TypeDef *usart, uint32_t flags)
00645 {
00646   usart->IEN |= flags;
00647 }
00648 
00649 
00650 /***************************************************************************/
00664 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USART_IntGet(USART_TypeDef *usart)
00665 {
00666   return usart->IF;
00667 }
00668 
00669 
00670 /***************************************************************************/
00689 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t USART_IntGetEnabled(USART_TypeDef *usart)
00690 {
00691   uint32_t tmp;
00692 
00693   /* Store USARTx->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00694    * of volatile accesses. */
00695   tmp = usart->IEN;
00696 
00697   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00698   return usart->IF & tmp;
00699 }
00700 
00701 
00702 /***************************************************************************/
00713 __STATIC_INLINE void USART_IntSet(USART_TypeDef *usart, uint32_t flags)
00714 {
00715   usart->IFS = flags;
00716 }
